kerala.title: Kerala
kerala.description: Kerala is known for its serene backwaters, lush greenery, and beaches.

packages.title: Luxury Backwater Cruise
packages.overview: Experience Kerala’s famous backwaters with a luxury houseboat stay, premium meals, and scenic village views.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Kochi
itinerary.description: Arrival at Kochi airport, private transfer to hotel, evening at leisure.

itinerary.title: Alleppey Houseboat Stay
itinerary.description: Check-in to luxury houseboat, cruise through backwaters with meals onboard.

itinerary.title: Kumarakom Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Visit Kumarakom Bird Sanctuary and enjoy village walks.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Checkout and transfer to Kochi airport.

packages.title: Kerala Nature Escape
packages.overview: A perfect nature getaway covering Munnar hills, tea gardens, waterfalls, and scenic viewpoints.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Transfer to Munnar
itinerary.description: Pickup from Kochi and scenic drive to Munnar.

itinerary.title: Munnar Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Visit Tea Museum, Mattupetty Dam, Echo Point.

itinerary.title: Waterfalls & Nature Walk
itinerary.description: Visit Attukad waterfalls and enjoy nature walks.

itinerary.title: Leisure Day
itinerary.description: Free day for shopping or relaxing.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Checkout and transfer to airport.

packages.title: Adventure Kerala
packages.overview: Designed for adventure lovers with trekking, wildlife safari, and outdoor experiences.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Kochi
itinerary.description: Pickup and hotel check-in.

itinerary.title: Wayanad Transfer
itinerary.description: Drive to Wayanad and evening campfire.

itinerary.title: Trekking & Caves
itinerary.description: Trek to Chembra Peak and explore Edakkal Caves.

itinerary.title: Wildlife Safari
itinerary.description: Jeep safari in Wayanad Wildlife Sanctuary.

itinerary.title: Leisure
itinerary.description: Free day for optional activities.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Return transfer to airport.

packages.title: Cultural Kerala Experience
packages.overview: Explore Kerala’s culture, temples, Ayurveda, Kathakali shows, and local cuisine.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Kochi
itinerary.description: Pickup and hotel check-in.

itinerary.title: Fort Kochi
itinerary.description: Visit Chinese fishing nets and heritage sites.

itinerary.title: Cultural Show
itinerary.description: Kathakali & Kalaripayattu performance.

itinerary.title: Ayurveda Session
itinerary.description: Traditional Ayurveda massage.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Checkout and airport transfer.

ooty.title: Ooty
ooty.description: Ooty (Udhagamandalam) is a charming hill station in the Nilgiri Hills known for its cool climate, scenic lakes, tea gardens, and misty mountain views.

packages.title: Ooty Hill Station Getaway
packages.overview: Enjoy cool mountain air, scenic views, lakes, and tea estate tours in Ooty.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Lake Visit
itinerary.description: Reach Ooty, check in and enjoy boating at Ooty Lake.

itinerary.title: Tea Gardens & Viewpoints
itinerary.description: Explore tea gardens and scenic viewpoints in the Nilgiris.

itinerary.title: Botanical Gardens & Rose Garden
itinerary.description: Visit Government Botanical Garden and Rose Garden.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Check out and transfer back.

packages.title: Ooty Nature & Lake Tour
packages.overview: A relaxed tour of forests, lakes, and viewpoints in the Nilgiris.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Exploration
itinerary.description: Arrival and local sightseeing.

itinerary.title: Pykara Lake Excursion
itinerary.description: Visit Pykara Lake & waterfalls.

itinerary.title: Doddabetta Peak
itinerary.description: Visit the highest point for panoramic views.

itinerary.title: Free Day
itinerary.description: Free day to enjoy gardens or markets.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Return journey.

packages.title: Ooty Adventure Hill Trip
packages.overview: Adventure-packed Ooty trip with trekking, lake boating, and nature trails.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Ooty
itinerary.description: Check in to hotel and evening free.

itinerary.title: Trekking & Forest Walks
itinerary.description: Guided trekking in Nilgiri hills and forest trails.

itinerary.title: Lake & Boat Ride
itinerary.description: Boating at Ooty Lake and leisure time.

itinerary.title: Doddabetta & Tea Gardens
itinerary.description: Visit Doddabetta peak and tea estates.

itinerary.title: Adventure Activities
itinerary.description: Optional zip-lining, cycling, and horse riding.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Checkout and return transfer.

packages.title: Ooty Relax & Culture
packages.overview: Relaxing Ooty trip with gardens, museums, local markets, and cultural experiences.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Leisure
itinerary.description: Check-in and evening leisure at hotel.

itinerary.title: Botanical Gardens & Museums
itinerary.description: Visit the Government Botanical Garden and local museums.

itinerary.title: Tea Factory & Market
itinerary.description: Tour of tea factory and local market shopping.

itinerary.title: Rose Garden & Leisure
itinerary.description: Visit Rose Garden and relax.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Checkout and return journey.
